name: 消灭魔王军 Destroy the demon army
description: This game is a purely placed game. The player can run the game automatically without any or little operation. The goal is to destroy all the Devils and Devils.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Windows 7/8/10 (32bit/64bit) Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 5 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Windows 7/8/10 (32bit/64bit) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GPU 2GB Storage: 10 MB available space
